The blast hit Razor Claws shield, it saved him from the power of the blast =
but he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell to the ground again spent from t=
he physical exhertion he'd put on himself. He picked himself up again insis=
ting on being destroyed on his feet. Fireballs hit Mobster causing Razor Cl=
aw to look back. Necromancer had arrived in time to save him.

Necromancer =
saw that he had Mobsters full attention when the giant fired on him. He tra=
nsformed to robot mode shrinking down to a smaller target to dodge the blas=
t. he rased his rifle and set it on high power. he fired five blasts at the=
 head of Mobster as he flew down to check the condition of the Raptor he'd =
just saved.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: SOULSTICE 
  To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, December 25, 2000 10:33 PM
  Subject: Re: Sor=
ry soulstice


  Mobster fired again at Razorclaw...
    ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Mon=
day, December 25, 2000 4:01 AM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Razor=
 Claw raised to his feat to stubborn to know when to quit. he stepped forwa=
rd, ready for anything the larger bot had to offer. "You ready to surrender=
 yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he already knew the answer.
     =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: SOULSTICE 
      To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 9:34 PM
      Subject: Re: S=
orry soulstice


      Mobster watched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and =
enjoying the thought. Mobster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited =
for Razorclaw to regain his strength and composure, he wanted to knock it o=
ut of Razorclaw again...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, Decembe=
r 25, 2000 3:16 AM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Razor Cla=
w bounced off Mobster, the impact made his head spin. The mighty raptor hea=
rd Mobster have some smart ass comment toward him. He looked up in time to =
see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor Claw turned and tried to run and =
got just far enough to avoid being hit directly by the beam. The weapon sti=
ll had a devastating effect on him though as the shrapnel of dirt and pebbl=
es shred at his skin. The blast shot him about sixty yards from where he'd =
started. He landed with an ooof as his body skipped multiple times across t=
he hard African ground. There he lay in pain, trying to regain his strength=
 and composure.
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: SOU=
LSTICE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, December =
24, 2000 1:53 PM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


          Mobster=
 wobbled some, but that was the extent of it. He turned around.

          =
Mobster (Grenade voice): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

    =
      Mobster fires at Razorclaw once...
            ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
           Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
            Subject: Re:=
 Sorry soulstice


            A sudden shadow covered Razor Claw as Mobste=
rs foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turned to run. His energ=
y was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not holding. He ran toward M=
obster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Claw, the impact shook=
 the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant gestalt. He rolled to=
 his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove forward at Mobsters re=
ar end hoping the giant would still be off balance enough to knock over.
  =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: SOULSTICE 
  =
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, December 24=
, 2000 10:46 AM
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


              =
(I normally am against stomping, but...)
               
              Mobs=
ter raised his foot.

              Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

       =
       Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
                ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
              =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1=
2:11 PM
                Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                Razo=
r Claw remained still as a statue, watching the battle rage around him. He =
opened a comm to anyone listening. "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'=
m pinned down and need some coverfire."
                  ----- Original Me=
ssage ----- 
                  From: SOULSTICE 
                  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
=
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  Mobster =
stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

                  Mob=
ster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to build t=
his house?

                  Mobster kept his cannon aimed at Razorclaw, w=
aiting and watching...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                  From: CYBERWOLF4 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                    Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
       =
             Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                    Razor Claw =
knew that there was only one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that s=
ize. he transformed to Raptor mode and used full strength on his shield. Th=
e ground around him incinerated on contact. He survived but it was sapping =
to much of his strength. The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his =
shield.
                      ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
       From: SOULSTICE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
     =
                 Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                 =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                      Mobster took a sc=
ratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed his giant c=
annon at Razorclaw and fired...
                        ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
                        From: CYBERWOLF4 
                      =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                        Sent: Friday, December 22=
, 2000 7:01 AM
                        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


     =
                   Razor Claw stood confused for the moment, he tried to sh=
ow no weakness. He stepped forward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is thi=
s supposed to impress me?" he asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
 =
                         ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
      From: SOULSTICE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
                        Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
        =
                  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                          =
Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place now.

   =
                       Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as Mobster, I cr=
ush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                          Mobster sw=
itches voices.

                          Kracken: But right now, we're Mob=
ster...
                            ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
                   From: CYBERWOLF4 
                            To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
                            Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000=
 10:15 AM
                            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


      =
                      Razor Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no=
 fear, "That sounds like a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knoc=
k me down, I join your alliance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Max=
imals, deal?" he stepped forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upp=
rcut into Gigas' stomach. "I'll go first."
                              --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                              From: SOULSTICE 
=
                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                     =
         Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                      =
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                              Gigas:=
 Oh, hohohohoho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I di=
dn't want to waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I=
 have seen battles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i st=
ill stand, I still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Allia=
nce, it would do you a world of good.

                              Gigas =
stayed planted to his spot, not moving an inch...
                         =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: =
CYBERWOLF4 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
                         Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
      =
                          Subject: Sorry soulstice


                      =
          Sorry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

    =
                            claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholde=
r 2 and Grenade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps i=
n the air and backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafi=
a. Gigas looks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw fig=
ure and the fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge)=
 Gigas swings a huge punch at Razorclaw

                                Ra=
zor Claws head snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell bu=
t Razor Claw wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked=
 back about ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the atta=
cker and couldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'=
d hate to have to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                      =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                                Fro=
m: THECODE 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
       =
                         Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
         =
                       Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe t=
he three should get help.


                                OOC: Hey, Gigas=
 punched at Razorclaw, post damage...
                                -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
             Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                    =
            Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should=
 get help.


                                Razor Claw saw the three bots =
leaving the sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance memb=
ers. he mentally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chase=
d the three until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to =
robot mode, pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you wil=
l be forced to, your choice."

                                He aproached=
 the three bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peac=
efully.
                                ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
                           From: dachande 
                                =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, Decem=
ber 18, 2000 7:40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolv=
eritron, and Ramus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/=
Ramus::
                                 
                                 =
   They had heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part=
 in the conflict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leavi=
ng, and togther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.
=




























        eGroups Sponsor
